headline: PPL Underperforms Its Industry in Six Months: How to Play the Stock?
summary: PPL stands to benefit from surging data center demand and major grid upgrades, but its premium valuation and softer returns are concerns.

raw.headline: PPL Underperforms Its Industry in Six Months: How to Play the Stock?
raw.summary: PPL stands to benefit from surging data center demand and major grid upgrades, but its premium valuation and softer returns are concerns.

headline: PPL Capital Funding, Inc. announces pricing of $1 billion of 3.000% Exchangeable Senior Notes
summary: PPL Capital Funding, Inc. ("PPL Capital Funding"), a wholly-owned subsidiary of PPL Corporation (NYSE: PPL), announced today the pricing of $1 billion aggregate principal amount of its 3.000% Exchangeable Senior Notes due 2030 (the "notes") in a private placement (the "offering") to persons reasonably believed to be qualified institutional buyers pursuant to Rule 144A under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the "Securities Act").
